markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Protective Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=2811) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goloma" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=381" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Vicious Goloma](/Heritages.aspx?ID=173) heritage

</column>

---

The chitin on your claws is so hard you can defend against attacks with them. Your claw unarmed attack from the vicious goloma heritage gains the [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190) weapon trait.
name: Protective Claws
